title: cultural_data_Discover_Venice_-_Venezia_audio_guide_and_map
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.discover.venice.
Application Name: Discover Venice - Venezia audio guide and map.
Number of Reviews: 55.00.
Application Description: Discover Venice is the ideal companion for your Venice visit! A self-guided walking tour, with hours of audio guides and a map that works offline, it's the ideal tour companion: ✔️Complete: with over 60 attractions, discover wonders like the Bridge Of Sighs and the Bell Tower of St. Mark.  Each attraction has a detailed and engaging audio guide.✔️Save: Save money on the traditional guided tours! Venezia it's big, don't get lost!✔️Audio Tour: extensive textual and audio guides for each point of interest. Discover the hidden pearls of Venezia!✔️Must-See: don't know where to start? We marked the places you must absolutely visit, to make sure you don't miss the best attractions in Venezia.✔️Offline: save on roaming charges, don't worry about 4G coverage, Discover Venice works offline! So if you are planning to visit Venezia, make sure to download Discover Venice for a complete and audio guide, map and tour!Read moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 933.00.
Overall Rate: 4.80.
First Page Reviews: very nice, easy to use and well designed. we would have been completely lost without this app that allowed us to visit the city of venice. very recommend..
